author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

See discussion at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36326#issuecomment-984417751.
Introduced (perhaps unintentionally) at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/feee05e06ecf6d30a94f3f3b0301eaa530847a5e. 
Seems to be very loud, but for no good reason. 

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles

title: silence SiPixelClusterizer: No digis to clusterize warning
